query:
SELECT id, 
                   client_id,
                   client_secret,
                   array_agg(role) AS "roles!"
            FROM "user" u
              INNER JOIN user_credentials c ON c.user_id = u.id
              INNER JOIN user_roles r ON r.user_id = u.id 
            WHERE client_id = $1
              AND client_secret = $2
            GROUP BY u.id, c.client_id
